title: New: Peaking Lights – Beautiful Son
content: Taken from their forthcoming album out 19 June on Mexican Summer, Beautiful Son is the second track to be taken from Peaking Light’s Lucifer. As we’re used to from the duo, it’s candyfloss psychedelic pop at it’s very best, adrenaline fueled and doused with a more than healthy dose of twee influence. Emphasizing the sultry female vocals before descending into a two minute guitar solo, it’s the definition of a slowburner, but boy is it beautiful.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
